name: FLO_INST_COSIGNED
description: This table displays times that cosigners cosigned the flowsheet data.

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the flowsheet data record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: INSTANT_COSIGNED_TM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that the co-signer co-signed the data.
